data.title: Did I win Tic-tac-toe?
data.statement:
You taught your daughters how to play tic-tac-toe, but they still have trouble determining which player wins the game. In order to help them, you write a program to find out who the winner is.
Game is played on a 3x3 cell board. The winner is the first player to align 3 identical symbols on the board. Symbols can be aligned vertically, horizontally, on diagonally.
data.constraints:
Players' symbols will always be different
Game board will always be size 3x3
data.stubGenerator:
read players:string(3)
loop 3 read boardLine:string(3)
write Winner
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>> : space-separated symbols of the players. For example {{X O}} : {{X}} is symbol for first player, {{O}} is second player. Remember symbols can be any letter!
<< Lines 2 to 4 >> : description of game board, size 3x3. No space between cell values on each line. Cell will have the following values : symbol of the first player, symbol of the second player, or {{.}} if no player put his symbol in the cell.
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1>> : the status or result of the game :
* {{Incomplete}} if the game is not complete and has no winner yet
* {{Player 1}} if player 1 wins
* {{Player 2}} if player 2 wins
* {{Draw}} if no winner

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You taught your daughters how to play tic-tac-toe, but they still have trouble determining which player wins the game. In order to help them, you write a program to find out who the winner is.
Game is played on a 3x3 cell board. The winner is the first player to align 3 identical symbols on the board. Symbols can be aligned vertically, horizontally, on diagonally.
Input
Line 1 : space-separated symbols of the players. For example X O : X is symbol for first player, O is second player. Remember symbols can be any letter!
Lines 2 to 4 : description of game board, size 3x3. No space between cell values on each line. Cell will have the following values : symbol of the first player, symbol of the second player, or . if no player put his symbol in the cell.
Output
Line 1 : the status or result of the game :
* Incomplete if the game is not complete and has no winner yet
* Player 1 if player 1 wins
* Player 2 if player 2 wins
* Draw if no winner
Constraints
Players' symbols will always be different
Game board will always be size 3x3
Example
Input
X O
XXX
OXO
OOX
Output
Player 1
